description: This file sets up an AI agent using the agno framework, configures it with specific models and tools, and prompts it to summarize a PDF file while searching the web for additional information.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model and tools, capable of processing responses.

classes.name: File
classes.description: Represents a media file, such as a PDF, with a URL.

classes.name: OpenAIResponses
classes.description: Represents a specific OpenAI response model configuration.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a prompt, including processing attached files.

methods.name: run_response
methods.description: Executes the response generation and provides citations.
